2086440.name: Motorcycle Racing VR
2086440.description:
If you like riding and racing motorcycles, or would like to, then this is the game for you! There are lots of motorcycle games out there but very few in Virtual Reality. This game puts the rider on the bike where one can experience the excitement of motorcycle racing without the danger!

Key Features


  • Ride in first person or third person mode
  • Choice of two tracks to race around
  • Multiplayer available
  • Steer the bike by leaning into the turn
  • Supports LIV app for recording avatar and mixed reality capture
  • Choice of motorcycle color and graphics
  • Race clockwise or anticlockwise
  • Choice of levels of difficulty
  • Lap records to beat
2086440.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
